body:
i am leaving because server is timezone-biased.

ill join if there are players online in my timezone

other than that, bye. i left discord server, imo its spam and a waste of my precious time.

if anyone wants to talk to me, dont.


heres my rant: (im not gonna reply to anyone)
Inactivity because of opposite timezone is bullshit. Am I suppose to move to Canada or the USA? No. Server calls opposite timezone "inactivity". When I'm online, you people are offline. I can't control that. And besides, there are like 0 players online everytime. Fix your own server's activity before you talk to me about inactivity. Farewell because you will never see me online if you're like 12hr apart from me. Bye.
